steps: 1) Choose a URL Drop landing page template, and prep it. Set the desired Go Live date and countdown for NFT redemption.
2) After taking the page live, using the Distribution Manager, you can generate a unique URL for each NFT in your collection.
3) Share the URL via email / chat / SMS or even drop it into your desired social media channel to target consumers of your choice.
4) Identifying the core campaign business objective
